title: Salary Configuration

hint.title: Usage Guide
hint.description: Manage employee salary configurations with the ability to plan salary increases.
hint.rule1: Only the "Applied" configuration will be used for payroll calculation
hint.rule2: Configurations used for payroll calculation cannot be edited or deleted
hint.rule3EndOfMonth: Payroll period is from the 1st to the end of the month
hint.rule3Custom: Payroll period is from the {startDay}th of last month to the {endDay}th of this month

affectsPayroll: This change will affect the current payroll period
affectsPayrollDescription: This change will affect the current payroll period ({period}). Are you sure you want to continue?
confirmCreateDescription: Are you sure you want to create this salary configuration?
confirmUpdateDescription: Are you sure you want to update this salary configuration?
deleteDescription: Delete this salary configuration? Cannot be undone.
cannotModifyUsed: This configuration has been used for payroll calculation and cannot be edited or deleted.
applyDescription: Apply this configuration? This configuration will be used for payroll calculation.
overlappingDescription: {count} other salary configuration(s) are active during the same period. You can delete them manually if needed.
affectsPayrollShort: This configuration will affect the {period} payroll period.

validation.effectiveToAfterFrom: End date must be after start date
